messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Chat? 6/27
messages.msgSnippet: I try to join the chat tonight, as I can attend it easier from here where I m now, though I m not sure if I can follow your conversations. momoiro-usagi san
messages.messageBody:
I try to join the chat tonight, as I can attend it easier from here where I'm
now, though I'm not sure if I can follow your conversations.

momoiro-usagi san
>Does Tama san live in the Tama area?
It is imagination from a name.
(Tokyo ni sundeiru kata desu yone?)

My HN tama is come from my name.
I'm living in Tokyo for most of year, but I'm in overseas now.
Your English is very good! It's my English which is mechakucha one.:-)

Tama



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

> Sao Paulo/Buenos Aires 6:00 pm

As I have a kenbu presentation on this very day, I'm
not sure if I'll be able to attend the chat, since I'm
not sure if I'll be home at that time, but I will try
to show up, at least later on. Either way, I hope that
the chat will be fun, as always :)

And definitely, after reading momoiro-usagi's comments
to Tama, I am certain that reading Japanese in romaji
is very different from reading Japanese in Japanese
(now, tell me some news :P)

Nja,

Serizawa Kamo

So there's not going to be one for the next weekend either? Well, I guess that means the next chat will be the weekend after, so I'll be missing that one as well... -sigh-


-MissBehavin

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Chat? 6/27
messages.msgSnippet: BarbaraSheridan  wrote: ... Oh, man... does this mean you re going to come on and give away the plot?    And here I was
messages.messageBody:
BarbaraSheridan <bsher213@...> wrote:

secretary wrote first:
>>*I am ~aware~ that a certain character portrayed by someone's favorite
>actor will be assasinated this week or next week on NHK Shinsengumi!<<

to which Barb replied:
>>*sniffle, sniffle* It's this week and the stockpiling of Kleenex has already begun.....Please feel free to wear virtual black garments to the chat as a sign of deep mourning *sniffle*<<

Oh, man... does this mean you're going to come on and give away the plot? <smirk> And here I was hoping to be surprised when I finally see it. <bigger smirk>

(I don't know, Kevin... just how many times *can* you watch Serizawa's assassination?)
(Not that that's what's going to happen on NHK this week... I'm not sure *who* bites the dust... I *do* know, however, who the favorite actor is. :-D)

phil (behind on too much NHK gossip, but very happy to have written a full draft of a chapter today! uh... the historical inaccuracies are just going to have to stay)



---------------------------------

messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Chat? 6/27
messages.msgSnippet: ... Tokio to Hajime/Goro Anata, I have set up an appointment for a family portrait I already had your uniformed dry cleaned and--- Hajime/Goro Woman?! Are
messages.messageBody:
secretary <secretarytocapt3@...> wrote:

>>recalling momoiro's words on the fear of having your soul sucked in by the camera...
Tokio to Hajime/Goro "Anata, I have set up an appointment for a family portrait I already had your uniformed dry cleaned and---"
Hajime/Goro "Woman?! Are you planning to kill me?"
Tokio in chibi mode [sweatdrop]<<

Hehehe... one more thing Hajime and the roosterhead agree on? (thinking of the RK episode "Danger on a Runaway Locomotive," where Kaoru forces Sano to have his picture taken)

Sano: "Hey man, I thought you were spending the day with the family"
Hajime: "The wife made an appointment for a family portrait"
Sano, grabbing Hajime & holding him close [sweatdrop]: "No! She's not going to take you away from me THAT way!"

>>Possible Topics to discuss (based on topic popularity):
Shinsengumi Grandpas ("Don't Mess With Miki" & Nagakura at the Movies)
Nagakura + Saitou after the Restoration
(The Absence of Saitou's name on the Cenotaph and its implications)
Saitou's words
Shinsengumi Spirits?
[More] Shinsengumi Stories?<<

Was Miki in on a plot to destroy Sagara??? MissB, you gonna be there? How about you, SK? You going to be there to keep me in line on Saigou? :-D (BTW, SK, MissB has given me sufficient reason to believe that Saigou had nothing to do with it...)

phil (still looking for intrigue... and someone to blame)


---------------------------------

messages.messageBody:

>I chose this date because we had a recent string of good topics and
>otherwise we would have to wait at least a couple more weeks for a

pork products are discouraged.....while Capt. Saitou encourages
consumption of soba dishes and along with Capt. Suzuki reminds you not
to forget the liquor hehehe

*sniffle, sniffle* It's this week and the stockpiling of Kleenex has
already begun.....Please feel free to wear virtual black garments to the
chat as a sign of deep mourning *sniffle*

>If this is the case we will have to push back the time (that being
>said I will miss 60 min. of the chat and [not] be able to maintain a
>transcript...so someone has to take up this task ^_^>>
>

time so if someone can make sure to get a transcript for that 45 min I'd
be eternally grateful


--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net

messages.subject: Chat? 6/27
messages.msgSnippet: *remember, you can chat with friends anytime over at the http://www.shinsengumimb.com...please don t feel as if you have to wait for these official ones
messages.messageBody:
*remember, you can chat with friends anytime over at the
http://www.shinsengumimb.com...please don't feel as if you have to
wait for these "official" ones

[Sunday June 27, 2004]
New York 5:00 pm
Los Angeles 2:00pm
Chicago 4:00 pm
Sao Paulo/Buenos Aires 6:00 pm
As a courtesy to our patient friends in Japan, Tokyo (Monday 6:00 am) -_-

I chose this date because we had a recent string of good topics and
otherwise we would have to wait at least a couple more weeks for a
chat because I know that on the 4th of July you all are planning
crossover patriotic Shinsengumi themed barbeques

*I am ~aware~ that a certain character portrayed by someone's favorite
actor will be assasinated this week or next week on NHK Shinsengumi!
If this is the case we will have to push back the time (that being
said I will miss 60 min. of the chat and [not] be able to maintain a
transcript...so someone has to take up this task ^_^

Possible Topics to discuss (based on topic popularity):
Shinsengumi Grandpas ("Don't Mess With Miki" & Nagakura at the Movies)
Nagakura + Saitou after the Restoration
(The Absence of Saitou's name on the Cenotaph and its implications)
Saitou's words
Shinsengumi Spirits?
[More] Shinsengumi Stories?
---------------------------------------------
recalling momoiro's words on the fear of having your soul sucked in by
the camera...
Tokio to Hajime/Goro "Anata, I have set up an appointment for a family
portrait I already had your uniformed dry cleaned and---"
Hajime/Goro "Woman?! Are you planning to kill me?"
Tokio in chibi mode [sweatdrop]
